directions.step:
1. DRAIN PEACHES AND PEARS. RESERVE JUICES. CUT FRUIT INTO 3/4 INCH PIECES.
2. COMBINE PINEAPPLE WITH PEACHES, PEARS AND JUICES FROM ALL FRUIT.
3. ADD ORANGES.
4. QUICKLY (TO PREVENT DISCOLORATION) COMBINE APPLES WITH FRUIT MIXTURE; MIX THOROUGHLY.
5. COVER, REFRIGERATE UNTIL READY TO SERVE. :
NOTE: 1. IN STEP 3, 4 LB 4 OZ FRESH ORANGES A.P. (11 ORANGES) WILL YIELD 3 LB PEELED ORANGES.
2. IN STEP 4, 4 LB 2 OZ FRESH APPLES A.P. (11 APPLES) WILL YIELD 3 LB 8 OZ CORED APPLES.
Recipe Number: J00601
SERVING SIZE: 1/2 CUP
